statements: SELECT * FROM game_assets WHERE id = 1;
SELECT asset_name, asset_type FROM game_assets WHERE id > 10 ORDER BY asset_name ASC;
SELECT asset_name, asset_type FROM game_assets WHERE id BETWEEN 5 AND 15;
SELECT asset_name FROM game_assets WHERE asset_type = 'character' LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, asset_type, asset_name FROM game_assets WHERE asset_name LIKE '%sword%';
SELECT * FROM game_assets ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, asset_name FROM game_assets WHERE asset_type IN ('weapon', 'armor') ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT id, asset_name, LENGTH(asset_file) AS file_size FROM game_assets WHERE LENGTH(asset_file) > 1000 ORDER BY asset_name;
SELECT id, asset_type FROM game_assets WHERE asset_name LIKE 'Sword%' OR asset_name LIKE 'Bow%' ORDER BY id;
SELECT * FROM game_assets WHERE id BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM game_assets;
SELECT asset_id, asset_type FROM game_assets ORDER BY asset_type DESC;
SELECT asset_id, asset_type FROM game_assets WHERE asset_type = 'weapon';
SELECT asset_id, asset_type, asset_data FROM game_assets WHERE asset_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM game_metadata WHERE metadata_key LIKE 'name%';
SELECT * FROM game_assets WHERE asset_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT asset_id, asset_type FROM game_assets WHERE asset_type = 'weapon' ORDER BY asset_id DESC;
SELECT asset_id, asset_data FROM game_assets WHERE asset_type = 'armor' AND asset_id IN ('123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001', '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174002');

SELECT asset_id, asset_type, metadata_key, metadata_value FROM game_assets JOIN game_metadata ON game_assets.asset_id = game_metadata.asset_id WHERE metadata_key = 'rarity' AND metadata_value = 'legendary';
SELECT asset_id, COUNT(metadata_id) AS metadata_count FROM game_metadata GROUP BY asset_id HAVING metadata_count > 5 ORDER BY metadata_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM images;
SELECT image_name FROM images WHERE image_id = 1;
SELECT image_id, image_name FROM images WHERE image_name LIKE '%landscape%';
SELECT image_id, image_name FROM images ORDER BY image_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM videos WHERE video_name LIKE '%tutorial%' ORDER BY video_id ASC;
SELECT image_name, image_url FROM images WHERE image_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM videos WHERE video_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY video_name DESC;
SELECT audio_id, audio_name FROM audio WHERE audio_url LIKE '%.mp3';
SELECT image_id, image_name, image_url FROM images WHERE image_id > 5 AND image_id < 10 ORDER BY image_id ASC;
SELECT video_name, video_url FROM videos WHERE LENGTH(video_name) > 10;
SELECT * FROM images;
SELECT image_id, image_name FROM images ORDER BY image_name DESC;
SELECT video_name, video_file FROM videos WHERE video_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614169001';
SELECT audio_name FROM audio_files WHERE audio_name LIKE '%music%';
SELECT asset_name, asset_type FROM game_assets ORDER BY asset_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM images LIMIT 5;
SELECT image_name, image_file FROM images WHERE image_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' OR image_id = '876e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT * FROM videos WHERE video_name LIKE '%fun%';
SELECT asset_id, asset_name FROM game_assets WHERE asset_type = 'character' ORDER BY asset_name ASC;
SELECT audio_id, audio_name FROM audio_files WHERE audio_name ILIKE 'music%' AND audio_file IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM images
SELECT id, image_url FROM images
SELECT id, image_url FROM images WHERE id = 1
SELECT * FROM videos ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT asset_name, asset_type FROM game_assets WHERE asset_type = 'image' LIMIT 10
SELECT id, image_url FROM images WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, video_url FROM videos WHERE id = 2;
SELECT id, audio_url FROM audio WHERE id = 3;
SELECT id, asset_name, asset_type FROM game_assets WHERE asset_type = 'character';
SELECT id, asset_id, link_id FROM asset_links ORDER BY id DESC;
